title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 2
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Kanata-san, thank you for inviting me today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>To be part of Kanata-san’s sweets gathering, Maru can’t sleep last night zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Me too! I held back to only eating one Onigiri at lunch♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin is happy to be able to participate in this gathering too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, thank you everyone~ Kanata had homework to create some original recipes, so Kanata wanted to test the recipes out~. That’s why Kanata is really grateful to everyone here today~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>So that means no one else has tasted these sweets before!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru is getting more and more excited zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Maybe I should’ve eaten only half an onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Go ahead and dig in. Let Kanata know what you think of the sweets, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch1003/>Thanks for the food~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Hauu~! This jelly is really refreshing and delicious! It feels somewhat tropical, what could it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata used a mix of ponkan and pineapple for that jelly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>This grainy pudding is so delicious~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Waah, to take a liking to that pudding, as expected of Hanayo-chan~. That pudding is called rice pudding, it has rice in it. It’s a sweets from Turkey. Kanata put a little bit of soybean flour in it for today~.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Rice and soybean flour…. So that means, it’s like…. rice and miso soup?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>K, Kanata is not sure about that….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Kanata-san, this no-bake cheesecake is the best~! I can’t get enough of the melon on the top….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>To receive praise on Kanata’s cheesecakes from Kotori-san, Kanata is even more confident now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Everyone is so focused on the sweets huh…. This is Kasumin’s chance…. *plop plop*. Here too, and here *plop plop plop*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huh? Suddenly there are mangoes on top of Maru’s jellies. ….*munch*, Hnn~! It has an even more tropical feeling now zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Waah! Before I knew it there were fruits on top of my rice puddings~! Ehehe, so luxurious~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It became a no-bake cheesecake compote with melons and peaches~! I can’t stop my hand~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kufufu, everyone is surprised at the strange phenomena…. Kasumin’s pra- no, Kasumin’s spell will definitely succeed today….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kasumi-chan….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Gyaan! Ka-, Kanata-senpai…. Did you…. s-, see….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata saw it all, Kanata is….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, uhh, the fruits in the fruit punch was so delicious, so Kasumin thought Kasumin should share some with everyone, umm….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kasumi-chan! Thank you!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Fueh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thanks to Kasumi-chan, Kanata’s original recipes have been powered up~! With this, Kanata’s homework is going to be perfect!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
